posts.post_content:
T206 McGraw Portrait (no hat, receding hairline).  Graded SGC 50.  As you can see from the close up pic there's a slight registration anomaly that moves his ruby red lips (makes you wonder what he did in his spare time) up his face creating a mustache of sorts.  Kinda makes him look like Adolph Menjou.

Edit:  MOVED TO EBAY
